name: Pong Clone (GamesByCN)
description:
Simple pong clone created in 1 hour for Learners Jam.

Its pong... you control the left paddle with your mouse.

The AI will control the right paddle. The AI cheats. 

There is no end to the game.. it is endless.

Features: 

  • You Are Always In Control: You can always send the ball to the right with a mouse click. 
  • Ball frensy: Tons of balls may spawn for super secret reasons! If used correctly you can beat the AI!

(Really these are is not bugs and totally intended)
